description.p: This wood and canvas glider transforms into a phoenix when thrown. It will travel 1d20+5 to the nearest 5 feat. Any creature in its path must make a Dexterity saving throw(DC: 10 + PB) or take 1d10+Con damage. Or half damage on a failed save. If the roll to throw is 1, the glider breaks on impact and must be repaired using 10GP of Canvas and wood.
While wearing these bracers, on your turn you may use a Bonus Action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your constitution modifier once per Short Rest.

When you cast a levelled spell, an ally within 30ft of you gains temporary hitpoints equal to the level of the spell cast. These temporary hitpoints stack with ones from this feature and last for 1 hour.
This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff.
